channel.title: Assistant Coder|Co-Owner *XenuPkz 718/742*
channel.description:
[center]I have found some people. Thanks for the interest, everyone.[/center]
[s]Hello, Moparians! I am looking for a coder/Co-Owner for my server. The last guy I had took my source (i gave him the incomplete files since I knew the kid was going to run off), and I can't tolerate the people who do this. If your one of them, leave.
[center][size=18pt]Coder:[/size]
Experience: Enough to know how to add commands, and create various custom things with me. Must be over 13. Must be mature. Must show me previous work and prove your not going to run off.[/center]
[center][size=18pt]Co-Owner:[/size]
Experience: Must have been an administrator or greater on a 718+ server. Must be over 13. Must be mature. You will go through a test run before I accept you.[/center]
My Skype: Imperial.Chime or... Post below![/s]

item.title: Assistant Coder|Co-Owner *XenuPkz 718/742*
item.dc:creator: @noah1gamble noah1gamble
item.description:
@noah1gamble wrote:

[quote=“Chimerica, post:1, topic:494161”][center]I have found some people. Thanks for the interest, everyone.[/center]

[s]Hello, Moparians! I am looking for a coder/Co-Owner for my server. The last guy I had took my source (i gave him the incomplete files since I knew the kid was going to run off), and I can’t tolerate the people who do this. If your one of them, leave.

[center][size=18pt]Coder:[/size]

Experience: Enough to know how to add commands, and create various custom things with me.
Must be over 13.
Must be mature.
Must show me previous work and prove your not going to run off.[/center]

[center][size=18pt]Co-Owner:[/size]

Experience: Must have been an administrator or greater on a 718+ server.
Must be over 13.
Must be mature.
You will go through a test run before I accept you.[/center]

My Skype: Imperial.Chime
or…
Post below![/s][/quote]
Coder:

Experience: Enough to know how to add commands, and create various custom things with me. (I Have coded MANY things, and i even made alot of my own npcs, i can show you if you add me on skype.)
Must be over 13. (Im 15)
Must be mature. (I Take RSPS & Coding VARY seriously.)
Must show me previous work and prove your not going to run off. (I Can try to prove it, but i know i would never try to steal someones work or anything like that)

Co-Owner:

Experience: Must have been an administrator or greater on a 718+ server. (Owned 3 servers, Co on 2, one was Voidscape 718)
Must be over 13. (Im 15)
Must be mature. (Im Very mature when it comes to RSPS)
You will go through a test run before I accept you. (Im fine with that)

Skype: noah1gamble
Email:noahrg2@hotmail.com (Avoid emailing m, I Dont check email often)
Or PM Me.

P.S I would even love to accept moderator. i have never yet been a moderator and i would love to have some experience. So i your willing to talk to me on skype, you can decide if im good enough. Thanks and bye.

Read full topic

item.title: Assistant Coder|Co-Owner *XenuPkz 718/742*
item.dc:creator: @Potzon Potzon
item.description:
@Potzon wrote:

[quote=“Fails, post:3, topic:494161”][quote author=Potzon link=topic=612394.msg4243469#msg4243469 date=1361956935]
Co-Owner
Experience: I’ve been an administrator on a few RSPS’s (I’m not sure if it was 3 or 4), I was Co-Owner (and one of the coders) on a RSPS I used to play (the owner stopped hosting the server), I’ve been an in-game moderator on 2-3 RSPS’s, and also a forum moderator. And OFC, most important I’ve owned my own project… So I’ve got some experience.

I’m 15 years old, and I’m mature.

Sadly, I haven’t got Skype so I had to post an “application” here on MoparScape.
If you would like to contact me, then here’s my email-addresses,

Hotmail: projectpotzon@hotmail.com
Gmail: projectpotzon@gmail.com

Oh, BTW, I joined the forums yesterday (if I don’t become Co-Owner, then I still want to play).
(And OFC, you can send me a PM on the forums as well)
[/quote]
kiss ass.[/quote]
Wut.

Read full topic

item.title: Assistant Coder|Co-Owner *XenuPkz 718/742*
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

I will code with you if you’re not completely ignorant. All I’m really trying to do is expand my revision knowledge. I’ll be 18 in two days and you can refer to my signature for proof of work.

Also, you might want to try the “Development Teams” section. Might yield more results.

Read full topic

item.title: Assistant Coder|Co-Owner *XenuPkz 718/742*
item.dc:creator: @teh_new_kid teh new kid
item.description:
@teh_new_kid wrote:

[font=courier][size=24pt]Co-Owner[/size][/font]

Hey man im a 16 year old runescape player i have played rsps for years now i started out on moparscape i am very good with 718+ i can even code… i would love to play your server and possibly i hope to get the possition but regardless i will still play the server and make a promo vid for you. i am very good with Photoshop and gfx. if you would like me to be a staff member other then Co- Owner thats ok to man i understand you need to do whats best for your rsps. If you decide to take me up on my offer i am also available 24 hours a day all day long due to the fact that i am homeschooled.
-If you are intrested in my offer please feel free to hit me up on skype @ryan.julien1 or shoot me a text 561.568.3957

Read full topic
